title: Why now is the moment Austria polesitter Norris can turn his F1 season around
summary: On pole position in Austria, Lando Norris isn't just in prime position to win at the Red Bull Ring, he could be at the start of a run which returns him to the lead of the championship

qa_pairs.question: What is pole position in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: The starting position at the front of the grid determined by the fastest qualifying lap.
wrong_options: The position assigned to the last car on the grid
A position awarded to the fastest lap in the race
A penalty position for slow performance

qa_pairs.question: Which track is referred to as the Red Bull Ring?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A motorsport circuit located in Spielberg, Austria.
wrong_options: An F1 venue in Suzuka, Japan

qa_pairs.question: Who is Lando Norris' current team in Formula 1 as of the 2023 season?
